overview: Summer 1988. Dry lightning sparks a fire in the parched and drought ridden landscape of Yellowstone Park igniting a blaze that would scorch over 1.5 Million acres. That winter surviving Fauna exhausted from fire and weakened by hunger die in greater numbers than those claimed by the fire. The cosmos turns from one season to another and another and life in the park begins anew.
title: Yellowstone 88 - Song of Fire
